channel.title: Need help with a few commands
channel.description:
i need help with a duel arena command. basically the command is suppose to work like this you type ::duelarena (username) and it sends a request for that user to ::accept then it teleports them both to a set location. But it doesnt quite work like that. when you type ::duelarena (username) it just teleports both users to the set location.
Also i need help with a wild switch command. so far i got the wild switch kinda working but it un wields all members items that are being wielded and doesn't allow you to re wield. so its kinda like a world switch but i just want it to be wild switch. can anyone help me?

item.title: Need help with a few commands
item.dc:creator: @Pandemicpk Pandemicpk
item.description:
@Pandemicpk wrote:

Can anyone help me with the duelarena command i posted above?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a few commands
item.dc:creator: @Pandemicpk Pandemicpk
item.description:
@Pandemicpk wrote:

lol well that helped it not removing the items over the world but now it doesnt remove them when u walk to the wild so the command ::setgame free does nothing :\

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few commands

item.title: Need help with a few commands
item.dc:creator: @Pandemicpk Pandemicpk
item.description:
@Pandemicpk wrote:

Not sure if this is what u wanted but ill post it any ways

public void checkItems() { int size = getInventory().size(); ListIterator<InvItem> iterator = getInventory().list.listIterator(size); for(int index = size - 1;iterator.hasPrevious();index--) { InvItem i = iterator.previous(); if(isMembers(i.getID())) { if(i.isWielded()) { getActionSender().sendSound("click"); i.setWield(false); updateWornItems(i.getWieldableDef().getWieldPos(), getPlayerAppearance().getSprite(i.getWieldableDef().getWieldPos())); getActionSender().sendEquipmentStats(); getActionSender().sendInventory(); } } } getActionSender().sendMessage("Your member items have been unwielded."); } public boolean isMembers(int id) { int memberItems[] = {522, 523, 524, 556, 559, 560, 561, 562, 563, 564, 565, 593, 594, 597, 607, 608, 609, 610, 614, 615, 616, 617, 618, 648, 649, 650, 651, 652, 653 ,654, 655, 656, 657, 702, 703, 754, 795, 826, 836, 837, 838, 839, 840, 841, 842, 843, 844, 845, 846, 847, 848, 849, 850, 851, 1000, 1213, 1214, 1215, 1216, 1217, 1218, 1278, 1215, 1217, 1218, 1256, 1278, 1288}; boolean members = false; for (int i = 0; i < memberItems.length; i++) { if (memberItems[i] == id) members = true; } return members; }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few commands

item.title: Need help with a few commands
item.dc:creator: @Pandemicpk Pandemicpk
item.description:
@Pandemicpk wrote:

Duel Arena command:

if(cmd.equals("duelarena") || cmd.equals("accept")) { if(args.length != 1) { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Invalid args. Syntax: duelarena (name)"); return; } Player affectedPlayer = world.getPlayer(DataConversions.usernameToHash(args[0])); if(affectedPlayer == null) { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Invalid player, maybe they aren't currently online?"); return; } Logger.mod(player.getUsername() + " you are now dueling " + affectedPlayer.getUsername()); affectedPlayer.teleport(299, 2944, true); if(cmd.equals("duelarena")) { player.teleport(290, 2939, true); } return; }

Wildy Switch:

[code] if(cmd.equals(“setgame”)) {
if(args[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“free”)) {
Config.members = false;
} else if(args[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“members”)) {
Config.members = true;
} else {
player.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gre@[Project-Elders]@whi@Wrong syntax,please use setgame (members/free) example, ::setgame members");
return;
}
for(Player players : world.getPlayers()) {
if(!Config.gameIsMember()) {
players.checkItems();
}
players.getActionSender().sendMessage("@gre@[Project-Elders] @whi@The game type is set to @gre@" + args[0] + “@whi@ now”);

		}
		Logger.mod(player.getUsername() + " set game-type to " + args[0]);

		return;
	}[/code]

Read full topic
